workspace 0.1.1

Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

workspace 0.1.1

Enhancement

  • Enhanced the restore confirmation message to display detailed information about the desired file #1
    • Refactored portions of the code within workspace_restore() for modularity
    • Implemented unit tests for the refactored code
  • Added a parameter to workspace_save() to control where workspace files are saved #5
  • Added an option while restoring to merge the current workspace with another file’s workspace #9
  • Improved user prompts to show that their environment will be cleared out while restoring

Feature

  • Introduced the ability to utilize the save and restore functions as add-ins #2

workspace 0.1.0

  • Added a NEWS.md file to track changes to the package

Contents

Developed by Kyle Harris.
